mapper.select: select P.ID, P.TITLE, P.AUTHOR, P.CREATED_TIME, count(R.ID) as RCNT from POSTS P left join REPLIES R on P.ID = R.POST_ID group by P.ID, P.TITLE, P.AUTHOR, P.CREATED_TIME order by P.ID desc
mapper.insert: insert into POSTS (TITLE, CONTENT, AUTHOR, CREATED_TIME, MODIFIED_TIME) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{author}, systimestamp, systimestamp)
mapper.select: select * from POSTS order by ID desc
